_sText:
English: 

The aim of the T's is to escape the Ct's and so to get weapons. All they need as quickly as possible to cross the obstacles.
If they make a mistake, they will be teleported back a bit. The Ct's have knifes. They run behind the T's and they have to try
to kill them.  At the end they get weapons, if not previously fired by the T's.
